html: Lock Down Your Login – For important sites, including email, banking, & social media, enable two-factor authentication. html: Protect Your Password – Create unique, strong passwords with eight characters or more. Use a combination of letters, numbers, and symbols that are not easy to guess. For more tips to protect your password, visit https://www.lockdownyourlogin.org/unique-passwords/ … #CyberMonth2018 (3/6)

html: I welcome the release of Pastor Brunson from house arrest and look forward to his return to the United States. Thousands of Americans have been praying for this outcome. The charges against him are baseless, and he should never have served a single day in jail.

html: The FCC has long played a role in supporting broadband deployments to brick-and-mortar healthcare facilities. Today, we build on that work by voting to explore a new Connected Care Pilot Program that would support a new trend in telehealth - towards connected everywhere.
text: The FCC has long played a role in supporting broadband deployments to brick-and-mortar healthcare facilities.  Today, we build on that work by voting to explore a new Connected Care Pilot Program that would support a new trend in telehealth - towards connected everywhere.

html: Jackson received record snowfall this weekend ahead of the state’s bicentennial celebrations. The National Weather Service in Jackson reported the snowfall was the highest storm accumulation since 1982. #MississippiMonday #MS200pic.twitter.com/Uq7cByqX6w

html: Mississippi’s #bicentennial is an important moment for our state. It marks the day our state became part of a growing nation that would go on to be the greatest the world has ever seen. #MS200
text: Mississippi’s #bicentennial is an important moment for our state. It marks the day our state became part of a growing nation that would go on to be the greatest the world has ever seen. #MS200

html: Let’s make this ceremony an opportunity to look ahead to the next 200 years and to resolve that this postage stamp of native soil will be a truly special place for those who follow. Happy Birthday, #Mississippi! #MS200 #Bicentennial

html: Let’s take this moment to imagine more powerful rocket engines, bigger battleships, more Rhodes Scholars, more Nobel prizes, more championships, and even more presidential visits. #MS200 #Mississippi #Bicentennial

html: As we consider the ghosts of #Mississippi, let’s concentrate most of all on the ghosts of #Mississippi yet to come. A future that includes more songs, more books, more inventions, more cures, more jobs. #MS200 #Bicentennial

html: Today, we shine the light on a history that is proud, but also sometimes painful. Mr. Faulkner would say that to understand this fact is to begin to understand the history of all humankind. #Mississippi #MS200 #Bicentennial
